title: Did Princess Diana leave Prince Harry a $10 million inheritance?
subtitle: In an interview with Oprah Winfrey in early 2021, Prince Harry and Megan, the Duchess of Sussex, discussed their rift with the British royal family.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Diana Spencer, Prince Harry's mother, left her son with an inheritance of about $10 million after she was killed in a car accident in 1997.
